title: Our Lady of Peace Novena
description: Our Lady of Peace is a traditional title of the Virgin Mary. Pray this novena for peace, Congregation of the Sacred Hearts of Jesus and Mary, El Salvador, Maine, Hawaii.

days.prayer:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here‚Ä¶)

The Lord has dealt with us according to His mercy; He has given us the joy of heart, that peace may flourish during our life and forever. Vouchsafe that I may praise you, O holy Virgin. Grant me strength against my enemies.

A Prayer for Peace O God, from whom proceed all holy desires, all right counsels and just works, grant unto us Your servants that peace which the world cannot give, that our hearts may be devoted to Your service, and that, being delivered from fear, we may pass our time in peace under Your protection. Amen. Ave Augustissima (Hail Most Venerable) Hail, you that are most Venerable, Queen of Peace, most holy Mother of God; through the Sacred Heart of Jesus your Son, the Prince of Peace, cause His anger to cease from us, so that He may reign over us in peace. Remember, O most gracious Virgin Mary, that never was it known that anyone who sought your prayers was forsaken by God. Inspired with this confidence, I come unto you. Despise not my petitions, O Mother of the Incarnate Word; but in your loving kindness hear and answer me, O merciful, O kind, O sweet Virgin Mary. Our Father (3 times) Our Father, Who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name; Thy kingdom come; Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread; and forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us; and lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil. Amen. Hail Mary (3 times) Hail, Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee. Blessed art thou amongst women and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus. Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our death. Amen. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here‚Ä¶)

Glorious and incomparable Virgin, Queen of Peace and Mother of Mercy, present us to your Son, the Prince of Peace and our most amiable Redeemer, and obtain through your powerful intercession that He may grant us in this life, not only relief in our afflictions, but also a universal peace; and after this life, the eternal peace of Heaven. Amen.

A Prayer for Peace O God, from whom proceed all holy desires, all right counsels and just works, grant unto us Your servants that peace which the world cannot give, that our hearts may be devoted to Your service, and that, being delivered from fear, we may pass our time in peace under Your protection. Amen. Ave Augustissima (Hail Most Venerable) Hail, you that are most Venerable, Queen of Peace, most holy Mother of God; through the Sacred Heart of Jesus your Son, the Prince of Peace, cause His anger to cease from us, so that He may reign over us in peace. Remember, O most gracious Virgin Mary, that never was it known that anyone who sought your prayers was forsaken by God. Inspired with this confidence, I come unto you. Despise not my petitions, O Mother of the Incarnate Word; but in your loving kindness hear and answer me, O merciful, O kind, O sweet Virgin Mary. Our Father (3 times) Our Father, Who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name; Thy kingdom come; Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread; and forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us; and lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil. Amen. Hail Mary (3 times) Hail, Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee. Blessed art thou amongst women and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus. Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our death. Amen. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here‚Ä¶)

O glorious Mother of the great Prince of Peace, of Him Who came down from Heaven to bring peace to the world, obtain for us through your intercession, a universal peace. We beseech you, fill our hearts with love of our holy religion, and make all nations enjoy a perfect tranquility, serving your Son in the perfection of a truly Christian life. Amen.

A Prayer for Peace O God, from whom proceed all holy desires, all right counsels and just works, grant unto us Your servants that peace which the world cannot give, that our hearts may be devoted to Your service, and that, being delivered from fear, we may pass our time in peace under Your protection. Amen. Ave Augustissima (Hail Most Venerable) Hail, you that are most Venerable, Queen of Peace, most holy Mother of God; through the Sacred Heart of Jesus your Son, the Prince of Peace, cause His anger to cease from us, so that He may reign over us in peace. Remember, O most gracious Virgin Mary, that never was it known that anyone who sought your prayers was forsaken by God. Inspired with this confidence, I come unto you. Despise not my petitions, O Mother of the Incarnate Word; but in your loving kindness hear and answer me, O merciful, O kind, O sweet Virgin Mary. Our Father (3 times) Our Father, Who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name; Thy kingdom come; Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread; and forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us; and lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil. Amen. Hail Mary (3 times) Hail, Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee. Blessed art thou amongst women and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus. Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our death. Amen. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here‚Ä¶)

We rejoice with you, O Mary, on account of all your virtues, but we rejoice especially because of your mercy, since it is through mercy that you are for us the Queen of Peace. Truly, your mercy has obtained the redemption of the world and the salvation of humankind. May our longing souls, therefore, hasten to this salutary source, and may our misery appeal to your inexhaustible mercy! Amen.

A Prayer for Peace O God, from whom proceed all holy desires, all right counsels and just works, grant unto us Your servants that peace which the world cannot give, that our hearts may be devoted to Your service, and that, being delivered from fear, we may pass our time in peace under Your protection. Remember, O most gracious Virgin Mary, that never was it known that anyone who sought your prayers was forsaken by God. Inspired with this confidence, I come unto you. Despise not my petitions, O Mother of the Incarnate Word; but in your loving kindness hear and answer me, O merciful, O kind, O sweet Virgin Mary. Our Father (3 times) Our Father, Who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name; Thy kingdom come; Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Hail Mary (3 times) Hail, Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee. Blessed art thou amongst women and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus. Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our death. Amen. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Our Lady of Peace, please obtain the graces I ask in this novena, especially for (mention request here‚Ä¶)

Most holy Virgin Mary, venerable Queen of Peace, full of confidence in your goodness, and animated with a lively desire to serve you, we consecrate ourselves to you now and forever, and we promise to do all in our power to make you known, loved, and honored. Deign to receive us among your privileged children; deign to watch over us and to protect us. Obtain, we beseech you, for Holy Mother Church, for our country, for us and those dear to us, that great gift of peace which your Divine Son appointed you to dispense to the world. Amen.

A Prayer for Peace O God, from whom proceed all holy desires, all right counsels and just works, grant unto us Your servants that peace which the world cannot give, that our hearts may be devoted to Your service, and that, being delivered from fear, we may pass our time in peace under Your protection. Amen. Ave Augustissima (Hail Most Venerable) Hail, you that are most Venerable, Queen of Peace, most holy Mother of God; through the Sacred Heart of Jesus your Son, the Prince of Peace, cause His anger to cease from us, so that He may reign over us in peace. Remember, O most gracious Virgin Mary, that never was it known that anyone who sought your prayers was forsaken by God. Inspired with this confidence, I come unto you. Despise not my petitions, O Mother of the Incarnate Word; but in your loving kindness hear and answer me, O merciful, O kind, O sweet Virgin Mary. Our Father (3 times) Our Father, Who art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name; Thy kingdom come; Thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread; and forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us; and lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil. Amen. Hail Mary (3 times) Hail, Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee. Blessed art thou amongst women and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus. Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our death. Amen. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
